channel.title: Health on Sam Killermann's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Health on Sam Killermann's Blog

item.title: Being Sick is a Good Time For Catching Up
item.description: I don’t often get sick, but when I do, I get sick. While I was in New Orleans I came down with a wicked case of Swamp Flu. Or maybe it’s the Bayou Bug. I just hope it’s not Crawfish Sickness.
